Utangulizi.content:
**Lishe katika mwaka wa pili** ni **hatua ya ukuaji wa haraka** – mtoto anajifunza kutembea, kusema, na kula peke yake. Chakula kinahitaji kuwa **chenye virutubisho vingi, laini, na salama**. Hii inaamua **akili, kinga, mifupa, na tabia** ya baadaye.

![Toddler Eating Healthy Food](https://www.cdc.gov/nutrition/images/toddler-eating-vegetables.jpg)

### Faida 10 za Lishe Bora
1. **Ubongo unaokua 80%** – Iron, DHA, Iodine
2. **Kinga dhidi ya magonjwa** – Vitamin A, C, Zinc
3. **Uzito bora** – 10–13 kg mwisho wa mwaka 2
4. **Kujifunza lugha** – Choline kutoka mayai
5. **Tabia nzuri** – Omega-3 hupunguza hasira
6. **Meno yenye nguvu** – Calcium, Vitamin D
7. **Kulinda dhidi ya unene** – Fiber, protini
8. **Kulinda dhidi ya anemia** – Iron-rich foods
9. **Kujisaidia kula** – Fine motor skills
10. **Furaha ya familia** – Kula pamoja

### Malengo ya eBook Hii
- **Chakula cha familia** (laini, salama)
- **Maziwa 500ml/siku** (mama au formula)
- **Ratiba 5 ya kila siku** inayoweza kufuatwa Tanzania
- **Vidokezo vya WHO & UNICEF**
- **Suluhisho la matatizo** (kukataa kula, kuhara)

### Vidokezo 5 vya Usalama
1. **Kata chakula vipande vidogo** (sio zaidi ya 1cm)
2. **Epuka karanga nzima, zabibu, popcorn** (kuziba hewa)
3. **Pika hadi iwe laini** (nyama, mboga)
4. **Osha vyombo** vizuri
5. **Hifadhi chakula** kwenye friji

**Kila kijiko, kila glasi ya maziwa – ni uwekezaji wa maisha yote ya mtoto wako!**

Virutubisho 7 Muhimu.content:
![Toddler Nutrition Pyramid](https://www.mayoclinic.org/-/media/kcms/gbs/patient-consumer/images/2023/08/toddler-nutrition-pyramid.jpg)

### 1. **Iron (7 mg/siku)**
- Huzuia anemia, husaidia ubongo
- **Vyakula**: Nyama nyekundu, kuku, dengu, mchicha
- **Vidokezo**: Kula na **Vitamin C** (nyanya, chungwa)

### 2. **Calcium (700 mg/siku)**
- Mifupa na meno
- **Vyakula**: Maziwa, yogurt, dagaa, mboga za majani

### 3. **Vitamin D (600 IU/siku)**
- Kunyonya calcium
- **Vyakula + Jua**: Maziwa, mayai, jua la asubuhi dakika 15

### 4. **Protein (13 g/siku)**
- Ukuaji wa misuli
- **Vyakula**: Mayai, kuku, maharagwe, karanga iliyosagwa

### 5. **Omega-3 (DHA)**
- Maendeleo ya ubongo
- **Vyakula**: Samaki, mbegu za chia, karanga za walnut

### 6. **Vitamin A**
- Macho, kinga
- **Vyakula**: Karoti, chungwa, mchicha, mayai

### 7. **Fiber (19 g/siku)**
- Kuzuia kuvimbiwa
- **Vyakula**: Matunda, nafaka nzima, mboga

![Toddler Food Sources](https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/baby/weaning-and-feeding/images/toddler-food-sources.jpg)

**Kila virutubisho ni hatua kuelekea mtoto mwenye afya!**

Chakula cha Ziada na Familia.content:
![Family Eating Together](https://www.babycenter.com/ims/2023/05/family-eating-together-4x3.jpg)

### 1. **Chakula cha Familia (Laini & Salama)**
- **Nyama**: Saga au kata vipande vidogo
- **Mboga**: Chemsha hadi iwe laini
- **Matunda**: Ponda au kata vipande vidogo
- **Wali/ugali**: Lainisha na mchuzi

### 2. **Vyakula 6 vya Kila Siku**
| Kundi         | Mifano Tanzania                          |
|---------------|------------------------------------------|
| **Nafaka**    | Wali wa kahawia, ugali, uji wa mtama     |
| **Protini**   | Kuku, samaki, dengu, mayai               |
| **Maziwa**    | Maziwa ya mama, formula, yogurt          |
| **Mboga**     | Mchicha, karoti, nyanya, boga            |
| **Matunda**   | Ndizi, embe, chungwa, papai              |
| **Mafuta**    | Parachichi, karanga iliyosagwa           |

### 3. **Vidokezo 5 vya Kula Pamoja**
1. **Kula pamoja** kila siku
2. **Epuka TV** wakati wa kula
3. **Ruhusu mtoto ajisaidie** (kijiko, mikono)
4. **Usilazimishe** – toa nafasi
5. **Pika kwa upendo** – ladha huathiri hamu

![Toddler Self-Feeding](https://www.healthline.com/health/parenting/images/toddler-self-feeding.jpg)

**Mwaka 1–2: Chakula cha familia ndio chakula bora zaidi!**

Ratiba ya Kila Siku.content:
![Toddler Daily Schedule](https://www.unicef.org/parenting/sites/parenting/files/2023-05/toddler-feeding-schedule.jpg)

### Miezi 12–18
| Muda       | Chakula                                      |
|------------|----------------------------------------------|
| 7:00 AM    | Maziwa 200ml + uji wa mtama + ndizi          |
| 10:00 AM   | Matunda (embe au chungwa) + karanga iliyosagwa |
| 1:00 PM    | Wali + kuku + mboga (mchicha, karoti)        |
| 4:00 PM    | Yogurt 100ml + mkate wa nafaka               |
| 7:00 PM    | Ugali + samaki + saladi + maziwa 150ml       |

### Miezi 18–24
| Muda       | Chakula                                      |
|------------|----------------------------------------------|
| 7:00 AM    | Maziwa 150ml + mayai + mkate + parachichi    |
| 10:00 AM   | Matunda + biskuti za nafaka                  |
| 1:00 PM    | Wali wa kahawia + nyama + mboga + maharagwe  |
| 4:00 PM    | Maziwa 100ml + karanga                       |
| 7:00 PM    | Ugali + dagaa + mboga + matunda              |

### Vidokezo
- **Maziwa 500ml/siku** (mama, formula, au maziwa ya ng'ombe)
- **Kunywa maji** kati ya chakula
- **Epuka juisi, soda, chai**
- **Pika safi kila siku**

![Portion Sizes](https://www.cdc.gov/nutrition/images/toddler-portion-sizes.jpg)

**Ratiba hii inafaa Tanzania – badilisha mboga na nyama tu!**

Vidokezo vya Wataalamu.content:
![WHO Toddler Guidelines](https://www.who.int/images/default-source/health-topics/toddler-nutrition/toddler-feeding-guidelines.jpg)

### Vidokezo 10 vya WHO & UNICEF
1. **Chakula cha familia** kuanzia mwaka 1
2. **Maziwa 500ml/siku** hadi miaka 2
3. **Kula mara 5** (3 chakula + 2 vitafunwa)
4. **Chakula laini, salama, na chenye virutubisho**
5. **Epuka chumvi, sukari, asali**
6. **Tumia kikombe** – sio chupa
7. **Kula pamoja na familia**
8. **Ruhusu mtoto ajisaidie**
9. **Anza na chakula 1 kipya** kila siku 3
10. **Angalia uzito** kila mwezi

### Vyakula 10 vya Kuepuka
1. Asali (botulism)
2. Chumvi
3. Sukari
4. Juisi
5. Soda
6. Karanga nzima
7. Popcorn
8. Zabibu
9. Nyama isiyopikwa
10. Chakula cha mifuko

### Dawa za Ziada
- **Vitamin D**: 600 IU/siku
- **Iron**: Ikiwa anemia (daktari)

**Afya ya mtoto ni afya ya taifa!**

Matatizo na Suluhisho.content:
![Toddler Feeding Issues](https://www.webmd.com/parenting/baby/ss/slideshow-toddler-feeding-issues.jpg)

### 1. **Mtoto Anakataa Kula**
- **Suluhisho**:
  - Kula **mara 5–6** (hata kama ni kidogo)
  - Badilisha **ladha na rangi**
  - Kula **pamoja na familia**
  - Usilazimishe

### 2. **Kuhara**
- **Suluhisho**:
  - Endelea **maziwa**
  - Ongeza **maji** na ORS
  - Epuka **juisi**

### 3. **Kuvimbiwa**
- **Suluhisho**:
  - Kula **matunda** (papai, ndizi)
  - Ongeza **maji**
  - Ponda **mboga**

### 4. **Anemia**
- **Suluhisho**:
  - Kula **nyama** mara 3 kwa wiki
  - Mchicha + limau
  - Chukua **dawa za iron** na daktari

### Jinsi ya Kujua Mtoto Anapata Virutubisho
| Mwaka | Uzito (kg) | Urefu (cm) |
|-------|------------|------------|
| 1     | 9.5–11     | 74–78      |
| 2     | 11.5–14    | 84–90      |

**Matatizo yanapungua kwa lishe bora!**

Hitimisho.content:
![Happy Toddler with Family](https://www.thebump.com/a/happy-toddler-eating-with-family.jpg)

### Muhtasari
| Mwaka | Chakula Kikuu |
|-------|---------------|
| 1–2   | Chakula cha familia + maziwa 500ml |
| 2+    | Chakula cha familia pekee |

### Faida za Maisha Yote
- Mtoto mwenye **akili, kinga, afya**
- Familia yenye **furaha, gharama za matibabu chini**

### Hatua 3 za Leo
1. **Andika ratiba** ya wiki hii
2. **Nunua mboga, matunda, nyama**
3. **Tembea kliniki** kwa uzito na vipimo

**Kila kijiko, kila tabasamu wakati wa kula – ni uwekezaji wa maisha yote.**
